data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Jeroen Manschot signals a Heerenveen throw-in in Amsterdam's half.
Amsterdam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jeroen Manschot awards Heerenveen a goal kick.
Throw-in Amsterdam.
Amsterdam to take a throw-in in Heerenveen territory.
Amsterdam have a dangerous throw-in.
Jeroen Manschot awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Heerenveen at Abe Lenstra Stadion.
Ball goes out of play for a Amsterdam goal kick.
Alen Halilovic (Heerenveen) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Heerenveen at Abe Lenstra Stadion.
Throw-in for Amsterdam in their own half.
Can Amsterdam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Heerenveen's half?
Throw-in for Amsterdam close to the penalty box.
Heerenveen have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Heerenveen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Heerenveen capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Jurrien Timber (Amsterdam) gets a yellow card.
In Heerenveen Heerenveen attack through Hicham Faik. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Heerenveen.
Throw-in for Amsterdam in the half of Heerenveen.
Jeroen Manschot signals a free kick to Amsterdam in their own half.
Free kick Amsterdam.
Heerenveen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Amsterdam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Amsterdam in Heerenveen.
Corner awarded to Amsterdam.
In Heerenveen Heerenveen drive forward through Chidera Ejuke. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Heerenveen have been awarded a corner by Jeroen Manschot.
Ball goes out of play for a Heerenveen goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Heerenveen.
Can Amsterdam capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Heerenveen's half?
Heerenveen will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Amsterdam.
Quincy Promes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Amsterdam.
Heerenveen needs to be cautious. Amsterdam have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Amsterdam have been awarded a corner by Jeroen Manschot.
Throw-in for Heerenveen in their own half.
In Heerenveen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Amsterdam have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Heerenveen at Abe Lenstra Stadion.
Corner awarded to Amsterdam.
Amsterdam's Quincy Promes is on target but unsuccessful.
Jeroen Manschot signals a throw-in for Heerenveen, close to Amsterdam's area.
Jeroen Manschot awards Amsterdam a goal kick.
Jeroen Manschot signals a throw-in for Heerenveen, close to Amsterdam's area.
Dusan Tadic for Amsterdam drives towards goal at Abe Lenstra Stadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Lassina Franck Traore (Amsterdam) strikes at Abe Lenstra Stadion but his header is cleared.
Chidera Ejuke of Heerenveen smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Jeroen Manschot awards the away team a throw-in.
Heerenveen to take a throw-in in Amsterdam territory.
Amsterdam push upfield but Jeroen Manschot quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Amsterdam in the half of Heerenveen.
Can Heerenveen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Amsterdam's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jeroen Manschot blows to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Goal kick for Heerenveen at Abe Lenstra Stadion.
Free kick for Amsterdam in their own half.
Jeroen Manschot signals a free kick to Heerenveen in their own half.
Jeroen Manschot awards Heerenveen a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Heerenveen.
Throw-in Amsterdam.
Amsterdam drive upfield and Lassina Franck Traore gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Heerenveen defender.
Amsterdam have been awarded a corner by Jeroen Manschot.
Amsterdam have been awarded a corner by Jeroen Manschot.
Ball goes out of play for a Heerenveen goal kick.
Can Heerenveen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Amsterdam's half?
Heerenveen's Joey Veerman gets in a shot on goal at Abe Lenstra Stadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Heerenveen.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Dusan Tadic.
Corner awarded to Amsterdam.
Great finish from Dusan Tadic to give Amsterdam a 0-2 lead.
Great play from Nicolas Tagliafico to set up the goal.
Jeroen Manschot signals a Amsterdam throw-in in Heerenveen's half.
Heerenveen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Heerenveen to take a throw-in in Amsterdam territory.
Goal! Amsterdam extend their lead to 0-3 through Quincy Promes.
Lassina Franck Traore instrumental with a fine assist.
Important block from the Heerenveen defence as Donny van de Beek fires in a strike for Amsterdam.
Corner awarded to Amsterdam.
Goal! Heerenveen reduce the deficit to 1-3 through Mitchell Van Bergen.
The away team replace Hakim Ziyech with Ryan Gravenberch.
Ball safe as Heerenveen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Heerenveen make their first substitution with Rami Hajal replacing Hicham Faik.
The home team have replaced Alen Halilovic with Jens Odgaard. This is the second substitution made today by Johnny Jansen.
In Heerenveen, Amsterdam push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Jens Odgaard of Heerenveen is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Amsterdam in the half of Heerenveen.
Jeroen Manschot signals a free kick to Amsterdam.
Amsterdam are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Heerenveen at Abe Lenstra Stadion.
Dusan Tadic is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for Amsterdam in their own half.
Jeroen Manschot signals a Amsterdam throw-in in Heerenveen's half.
Heerenveen advance rapidly upfield but Jeroen Manschot blows for offside.
Dusan Tadic for Amsterdam is back on the field again.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Heerenveen to check on Jurrien Timber, who is grimacing with pain.
It seems as if Jurrien Timber is unable to continue. Edson Alvarez replaces him for the away team.
Amsterdam's Lisandro Martinez misses with an attempt on goal.
Heerenveen have a goal kick.
Jeroen Manschot awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Heerenveen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Amsterdam have a goal kick.
Klaas-Jan Huntelaar is on a sub for Lassina Franck Traore for Amsterdam.
Amsterdam have been awarded a corner by Jeroen Manschot.
In Heerenveen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Amsterdam in their own half.
Rodney Kongolo (Heerenveen) has received a first yellow card.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Free kick Amsterdam.
Amsterdam have been awarded a corner by Jeroen Manschot.
At Abe Lenstra Stadion, Amsterdam are penalized for being offside.
Corner awarded to Heerenveen.
Botman Sven (Heerenveen) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Heerenveen.
Ball goes out of play for a Amsterdam goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-3.
